column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The restaurant has a bunch of appetizer options such as cheesy garlic bread
column3: etc but we just wanted to stuff ourselves with pizza. We ordered the Lou (the veggie friendly one) and the original Malanati Chicago classic which included sausage
column5: and tomato sauce. Service was definitely rushed and waiters seemed overwhelmed but we were able to order our pizza and get it within the hour. It was a very flavorful pizza that was definitely worth the money (around $12 each).
